pages.text: There used to be a warrior who lost his deepest loved person. He wielded his last beloved Blade, and embarked on the road of revenge and returning home.$(br2)He battled until death, but his spirit refused to get purified.$(br2)The Blade he wielded was called Slash Edge, which means the Blade of Slashing.
He battled alone, only himself, so-called $(o)loneliness$(). His spirit is still wielding his Blade, longing to get home...
